pages.text: Want to shoot things, but don't want to make or carry any ammunition? $(thing)Blasters$() are your friend!$(br)$(thing)Blasters$() utilise your natural $(thing)spirit$() to charge shots, allowing you to deal quick damage at range, with the drawback of only being able to fire in short bursts.
pages.title: Blasters

pages.text: To fire a $(thing)blaster$(), hold it out and hold right-click. After a short charge-up time, the blaster will begin to fire, dealing energy damage to targets.$(br2)Energy-based projectiles don't have the mass required to punch through foliage like $(thing)arrows$() or $(thing)bullets$() might, and will dissipate quickly in water.$(br2)The $(thing)blaster$() will be able to continue firing until you run out of $(l:aoa3:spirit#spirit)spirit$(/l).
$(l:aoa3:guns#guns)Guns$(/l) without ammo? $(thing)Blasters$() are here for you!
pages.title: A Blaster

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)blasters$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
